post.limitTag: You’ve reached the tag limit. Edit or remove existing tags to make changes.

post.howTowriteDes: You’re ready to ask a programming-related question and this form will help guide you through the process. Looking to ask a non-programming question? See the topics here to find a relevant site.
post.step1: • Summarize your problem in a one-line title.
post.step2: • Describe your problem in more detail.
post.step3: • Describe what you tried and what you expected to happen.
post.step4: • Add “tags” which help surface your question to members of the community.
post.step5: • Review your question and post it to the site.

answer.correctDes: Once confirmed, this answer will be highlighted as the official solution to the question, and other users will see it as the accepted answer. You can still change this later if needed
answer.correctDulicat: This will set the new answer as the correct solution, and the current correct answer will lose its status. Are you sure you want to make this change?
